service_name: DCG MPLS IP VPN as a Service
page_content:
Data Continuity Group

DCG MPLS IP VPN as a Service

DCG’s MPLS IP-VPN is a low-cost, highly secure and reliable enterprise networking solution that enables companies to connect multiple, geographically dispersed sites. The DCG MPLS IP-VPN is a high quality high performance Private Cloud solution that enhances companies’ operational efficiency and business activity in a cost effective and flexible manner.

Features

  • Fully managed Private Cloud MPLS IP-VPN with multiple access mechanisms
  • Enable Remote, Home, Mobile users connect to Organisations internal network
  • Provids ability to exchange business critical information between sites securely
  • Full integration with Customer’s Active Directory, allowing automatic synchronization
  • Provides centralised user authentication, authorisation, auditing and accounting
  • Service built on managed server clusters hosted by DCG
  • Hosted in highly secure and resilient UK based Datacentre environment
  • DCG Private MPLS network infrastructure: wholly owned, fully managed, resilient
  • Network topology fully redundant: diverse routing to Customers main sites

Benefits

  • Connect multiple, geographically different sites
  • Highly scalable & flexible: Administrators quickly add, remove, upgrade users
  • Reliable, redundant and resilient service backed by design
  • Maximize service efficiency
  • Highly secure Enterprise-grade solution
  • Pro-active monitoring and maintenance
  • Optimized to work with PC’s/laptops utilizing the Microsoft OS
  • No need to install separate VPN client software
  • Fully managed service: managed, monitored and maintained by DCG
  • Cost effective

Pricing

£4.50 to £6 per user per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial option available
